aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.text: My name is MÃ©lanie Rodrigues, and I'm a creative developer based in Lisbon, Portugal. With my 3 years of experience as a product designer and project manager, I bring a unique perspective to my current work as a developer. I'm passionate about all things tech and design, and I love nothing more than creating beautiful and functional websites and applications. In my free time, I enjoy exploring the world of game development, riding my motorcycle, camping, and indulging in my love of illustration. My approach to work is all about collaboration, creativity, and clean code! I believe that a positive and solution-driven attitude is essential to success. If you're interested in working together on a project, please don't hesitate to get in touch. I'm always up for a new challenge and would love to hear about your ideas.
